title: Get a one-year Executive Costco Gold Star Membership plus a $40 digital shop card for $120
content:
Macworld

Whether you’re restocking the house after your holiday visitors have departed or just getting your regular shopping done, you might be able to make your budget go further by shopping at Costco.

You could also unlock the chance for extra rewards like annual rewards, check printing, and more, but only with a Costco Executive Gold Star Membership. However, until January 7, you can get a one-year Executive Gold Star Membership and a $40 Digital Costco Shop Card for $120. 

The Executive Gold Star Membership gives shoppers access to all the same features as the basic Gold Star Membership, plus some extras. That includes the chance to earn an annual 2% reward (up to $1,000) on qualifying purchases and select discounts on some Costco services. This deal is only available to new members, though. 

You only have until January 7 at 11:59 p.m. PT to get a Costco 1-Year Executive Gold Star Membership and a $40 Digital Costco Shop Card for $120. 

 

Costco 1-Year Executive Gold Star Membership + $40 Digital Costco Shop Card – $120

See Deal

Prices subject to change

*Services are provided to Costco members by third parties.

*To receive a Digital Costco Shop Card, you must provide a valid email address at the time of sign-up. If you elect not to provide a valid email address, a Digital Costco Shop Card will not be emailed. Valid only for nonmembers for their first year of membership. Limit one per household. Nontransferable and may not be combined with any other promotion. New members will receive their Digital Costco Shop Card by email within 2 weeks of sign-up. Costco Shop Cards are not redeemable for cash, except as required by law. Digital Costco Shop Cards are not accepted at Gas Stations, Car Washes, or Food Court Kiosks. A Costco membership is $60 a year. An Executive Membership is an additional $60 upgrade fee a year. Each membership includes one free Household Card. May be subject to sales tax. Costco accepts all Visa cards, as well as cash, checks, debit/ATM cards, EBT and Costco Shop Cards. Departments and product selection may vary.

Accessories
